MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Kirkcowan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:48pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties locating the root cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:22pm on Monday, 1st March 2021
